[SyntaxError]: 'yield' is only allowed within generator functions. (1,16)
1|"use strict"; (yield) => 42
 |              ^
[SyntaxError]: unexpect keyword in strict mode (1,16)
1|"use strict"; (yield) => 42
 |              ^
[SyntaxError]: unexpect keyword in strict mode (1,16)
1|"use strict"; (yield) => 42
 |              ^
